mapper.sql: id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, is_deleted, account_id, goods_id, sku_id, count
mapper.select: select * from shopping_cart where is_deleted = 0 and account_id = #{accountId}
mapper.insert: insert into shopping_cart (account_id, goods_id, sku_id, count) values (#{accountId}, #{goodsId}, #{skuId}, #{count})
mapper.delete: delete from shopping_cart where account_id = #{accountId} and goods_id = #{goodsId} and sku_id = #{skuId} limit 1
